addToProfile

public abstract void addToProfile(HeritrixProfile profile,
                                  java.lang.String aName)
                           throws DuplicateNameException,
                                  javax.management.AttributeNotFoundException,
                                  javax.management.InvalidAttributeValueException,
                                  javax.management.AttributeNotFoundException
Adds the credential to the realm.

Parameters:
profile - The HeritrixProfile to add the credentials to.
aName - The name to use for the credentials.
Throws:
DuplicateNameException - is the name is already used.
javax.management.AttributeNotFoundException - if the credentials element cannot be found.
javax.management.InvalidAttributeValueException
